name: Arkscicos
body:
# ArkScicos

(The Autonomous Robotics Kit Scicoslab Toolbox)

The goal of this project is to provide simulation tools for guidance, control, and navigation algorithm development for micro aerial vehicles. 

* Instructions for installation are here: [[Installation]].
* Want to help out? See the project [[roadmap|Roadmap]].
* CTest Dashboard: http://my.cdash.org/index.php?project=arkscicos
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
